name: Untitled Ball Game (chinpenguin)
description:
A short 2-world, 20-level Monkey Ball-esque game with pixel-art vaporwave and synthwave aesthetics. Includes controller support!

This is my first "complete" game so feedback is appreciated!

Created with Unity 2020.1. Uses CC0 Kenny UI assets and the CC0 Superpowers font by MedicineStorm. Creative Commons background music by various artists is included.
